definition: monk fruit, the sweet fruit of Siraitia grosvenorii, a vine of the Curcubitaceae family native to southern China and northern Thailand, used in Chinese medicine
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Mangosteen is a fruit from southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 罗汉果是一个水果来自东南亚。

sentences.english: 'Changtanguo' is the best variety of Luohanguo, Siraitia grosvenorii (Swingle) C.
sentences.chinese: 长滩果系罗汉果最佳品种。

sentences.english: After10 days of culture, the base of the stem began to expand.
sentences.chinese: 培养10天后罗汉果茎段的基部一端开始膨大。

sentences.english: This work has provided a basis for cloning sex-linked gene.
sentences.chinese: 本实验为罗汉果性别连锁基因的克隆提供了基础。

sentences.english: Seedlings grafted on X3 had not blossomed.
sentences.chinese: X3砧罗汉果嫁接苗没有开花。

sentences.english: Mangosteen tea a valuable medicine, and cooler Wei Gan, functional Qingfei Runchang.
sentences.chinese: 罗汉果茶一种名贵药材，性凉味甘，功能清肺润肠。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a natural additive for tobacco use.
sentences.chinese: 一种增香保润天然烟用添加剂，其原料为罗汉果。

sentences.english: Momordica grosvenori swingle was used as the main raw material to develop a health herbal beverage.
sentences.chinese: 以罗汉果为主要原料研制罗汉果植物保健饮料。

sentences.english: Momordica grosvenori swingle was used as the main raw material to develop a health herbal beverage.
sentences.chinese: 以罗汉果为主要原料研制罗汉果植物保健饮料。

definition: orange peel/tangerine peel/dried orange peel used in Chinese medicine
Sichuan fritillary bulb (Bulbus fritillariae cirrhosae, used in TCM)
Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
grains of Job's tears plant 薏苡[yi4 yi3]
